Flow.description: Auto-populates the MEDDICC Qualification field with a template when a new Opportunity is created.

formulas.name: MEDDICCTemplate
formulas.expression: "M - METRICS" & BR() & "Desired state metrics/quantifiable impact:" & BR() & BR() & "E - ECONOMIC BUYER" & BR() & "Economic buyer engagement and their goals/needs/decision criteria:" & BR() & BR() & "D - DECISION CRITERIA" & BR() & "Main decision criteria with emphasis on pressing needs + use cases:" & BR() & BR() & "D - DECISION PROCESS" & BR() & "Key decision making process (timeline, budget, stakeholders, purchase process):" & BR() & BR() & "I - IDENTIFY PAIN / COMPELLING EVENT" & BR() & "Root causes, quantifiable impact, implementation timeline, cost of inaction:" & BR() & BR() & "C - CHAMPION" & BR() & "Champion identified and tested:" & BR() & BR() & "C - COMPETITION" & BR() & "Competitors (new and incumbent) and sentiment:" & BR()

Flow.label: Opportunity MEDDICC Template
